description.p: Skilled at misdirection and being awesome, you gain the following benefits

ul.li: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
As an action, you can stow or draw one chosen weapon in a pocket dimension.

If your attack hits, it deals Critical Damage
The damage dealt by your attack ignores all damage resistance and all damage immunity

You are magically predisposed to Lock Smithing. Perhaps you have an unknown connection to the Clockwork Plane. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You can cast the Knock spell at will.
When you cast Knock, it produces no sound.
You gain proficiency with Thieve's Tools, or Expertise if you already have proficiency with them.
As a bonus action, you can summon magical Thieve's Tools for a duration of 5 minutes, after which they vanish.

description.p: You can use your psychic powers at will (no action needed) to manifest ammunition for a Ranged Weapon that you are wielding. It appears to be constructed of spectral wisps, and vanishes after 3 rounds.

You are an expert at delivering goods and packages.

ul.li: Your speed increases by 10 feet.
You can travel at your normal speed even when encumbered.

The spell Galder's Speedy Courier (LLoK) is added to your spell list, and you can cast it once (at its lowest level) per Long Rest without expending a spell slot, although it does still require the material components.

You have a natural affinity with Ungulate Beasts (large mammals with hooves), and gain the following benefits

ul.li: You gain the Animal Friendship spell, and can cast it at will but only with Ungulate Beasts.
You gain the Find Steed spell but can only summon Ungulate Beasts with it, and each Long Rest you can cast it without a spell slot a nuber of times equal to your Proficiency Modifier.
You have Advantage on Animal Handling checks with Ungulate Beasts.
